text: int main ( int argc , char * argv [ ] ) { int t , i , j , x , n , max ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] [ n ] , s [ n ] [ n ] , valid [ n ] [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; valid [ i ] [ j ] = 1007 ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { x = 0 ; if ( i > 0 && j > 0 && valid [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] == 1007 ) x = s [ i - 1 ] [ j - 1 ] ; if ( i > 0 && ( x < s [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ) && ( valid [ i - 1 ] [ j ] == 1007 ) ) x = s [ i - 1 ] [ j ] ; s [ i ] [ j ] = a [ i ] [ j ] + x ; } } max = - 100000 ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) { if ( s [ i ] [ j ] > max ) max = s [ i ] [ j ] ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , max ) ; } return 0 ; }
